SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Contact
Contact class is a Contact object and stores various methods to create a contact.
ContactManager
ContactManager class contains three methods to manage the contact-data.
ContactsApp
ContactsApp class provides a Contacts App This program manages user-given contact-information by saving it into a CSV-file precisely without losing any information before quitting.
ContactsUI
ContactsUI class contains the CLI UI of the app.
FileOperations
FileOperations class contains different methods for operating with the CSV-file.
Validation
Validation class Class has methods for validating different user-given inputs to match the correct form.
